0101100101011000 1100110011011010 1 -> sum: 0010011000110011, cout: 1
1010101101000011 0001010100111011 1 -> sum: 1100000001111111, cout: 0
0010110110101001 1010000001000101 1 -> sum: 1100110111101111, cout: 0
